body_html:
here's a few more information

I use
cudnn : 4.0.7 (can't find the 4.0.4 that seems to be the one that's officialy supported)
cuda : 7.5.18
drivers : 352.79

maybe that will help find the bug
just to be clear because the title doesn't reflect this :
the nvidia driver crash. you can't use the cards anymore until you physicaly reboot the server.
if you try a soft reboot it it will crash the system completly.

body:
here's a few more information

I use 
cudnn : 4.0.7 (can't find the 4.0.4 that seems to be the one that's officialy supported)
cuda : 7.5.18
drivers : 352.79 

maybe that will help find the bug
just to be clear because the title doesn't reflect this :
**the nvidia driver crash. you can't use the cards anymore until you physicaly reboot the server.
if you try a soft reboot it it will crash the system completly.**
